About

The Lou Gehrig Fan Club honors the life and legacy of Lou Gehrig and supports ongoing ALS awareness and research efforts in his memory.

Our Mission

  • Celebrate and preserve the story of Lou Gehrig
  • Support ALS research and patient advocacy
  • Build a community of fans and contributors

Learn more about ALS and how you can help through trusted organizations and initiatives.
